sections.Objective: Experienced software developer with a passion for innovation, seeking opportunities to leverage my skills in web development, machine learning, cloud computing, and database management to drive impactful projects and contribute to the success of forward-thinking teams.
sections.Summary: Experienced software developer with a strong background in web development, backend development, machine learning, cloud computing, and database management. Currently pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science at the College of Management.

Education.Degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (In Progress)

responsibilities: Collaborated with the college web development team to design and develop web applications.
Developed responsive and user-friendly front-end using JavaScript, React, and Next.js.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for seamless communication between the front-end and back-end systems.
Enhanced website performance through code optimization, resulting in faster loading times.
Contributed to the maintenance and improvement of existing web applications.
Collaborated with UI/UX designers to ensure a visually appealing and user-centric design.
Led the front-end development of an e-commerce website as part of a team project.
Implemented CRUD functionality for three models, ensuring smooth data management.
Integrated Bing Maps API for geocoding and location-based features.
Fetched and displayed data from MongoDB using the MVC architecture.
Collaborated closely with team members to ensure project milestones and deadlines were met.
Operated as an independent creative professional specializing in design, photography, and video editing.
Provided creative services to clients, including design work, photography sessions, and video editing projects.
Managed client relationships, project timelines, and delivered high-quality creative content.
Built a strong reputation and client base over the nine-year period.
Founded and operated a commercial studio specializing in photography.
Focused on commercial photography, studio shoots, and client collaborations.
Managed all aspects of studio operations, including client acquisition, project management, and budgeting.
Successfully operated the studio for one year before closing it down in 2022.

BookScrabble - Multiplayer Word Game.description: Led the development team, ensuring project milestones and deadlines were met.
accomplishments: Implemented game mechanics, word validation, scoring, and real-time gameplay updates.
Designed networking features for multiplayer gameplay and chat functionality.
Utilized MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel) architecture for code organization and maintainability.
Received positive user feedback for an engaging gaming experience.

Oracle Cloud AI Hackathon (Third Place).description: Participated in the Oracle Cloud AI Hackathon and secured third place with my team. Developed innovative solutions using Oracle's cloud and AI technologies.
accomplishments: Collaborated closely with team members to brainstorm and implement creative ideas.
Utilized Oracle's cloud services and AI tools to build and present our solutions.
Demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and innovative thinking.
Received recognition for securing the third-place position in the competition.

iOS Development: iOS app development using Swift, UIKit, SwiftUI, ARKit 2, and CoreML
